Item.Value: [Text:The road has been your companion for days. Stretching on endlessely as you leave your old life behind, searching for a place that could use someone of your talents. All around you, you leave behind the remnants of a war-torn land, until at last you arrive here. A small valley, all but hidden from the last war. River Hollow.]
[Text:Ah! You must be $Name!$ I'm $Character_14$, it's good to meet you. So, what do you think of the place? I know it's not much, but it's a start no?]

[Text:So you're a potion maker, right? I haven't gotten around to setting it up yet, so you should clear some space and set up a $Building_8$ for yourself. The $Building_9$ is just to the North East there to refine some of this $Item_2$ into $Item_60$]
[Text:Beyond that, the surrounding area has lots of resources you should be able to use in your potions, so you should definitely get acquainted with the surrounding area.]

[Text:There's a cave to the East of town. It should be a good place for gathering mushrooms, ore and gemstones. The forest to the West of town can probably supply you with herbs and other plants, but I don't really know what's important. Be careful if you go exploring though, there's monsters around.]
[Text:Once you sell some potions, come check out my shop. I'm working on some new building designs to help improve the town!]
